name: Hapland
storyline: You have to find a way to open the portal by enlisting the help of the people who live in the world, while not getting them eaten by monsters or blown up by landmines.
summary: Hapland is a point-and-click puzzle that was originally released as Flash game in 2005. In the game you have to find a way to open the portal by enlisting the help of the people who live in the world, while not getting them eaten by monsters or blown up by landmines.
